name: photographer

A2 a person who takes photographs, either as a job or hobby: a fashion/press/amateur photographer
Hoxton/Chris Ryan/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesShe's a professional photographer.She was surrounded by a group of admiring photographers.That whole weekend at Cannes Brigitte Bardot was under siege by photographers.press photographersShe descended the sweeping staircase into the crowd of photographers and journalists.
